mapper.select: select count(1) from pj_project where name = #{name} and is_delete = 1
select pj_project.* from pj_user join pj_project on pj_user.pj_project_id = pj_project.id where pj_user.user_id = #{userId} and pj_project.is_delete = 0
select sys_user.* from pj_project join pj_user on pj_project.id = pj_user.pj_project_id join sys_user on pj_user.user_id = sys_user.user_id where pj_project.id = #{projectId}
select pj_project.* from pj_task join pj_task_stages on pj_task.pj_task_stages_id = pj_task_stages.id join pj_project on pj_task_stages.pj_project_id = pj_project.id where pj_task.id = #{taskId}
